# Sebastian Selinger - Full Profile

> System Administrator at the University of Freiburg, Owner of Selinger Consulting (IT Consulting), and QA Expert in the Gaming Industry with focus on AR/VR. Based in Freiburg, Germany.

## Professional Summary

Sebastian Selinger is a versatile IT professional combining system administration, IT consulting, and quality assurance expertise. His career spans university IT infrastructure, independent consulting, and specialized QA work in the gaming and AR/VR sectors.

## Professional Pillars

### 1. University of Freiburg - System Administration
- Role: System Administrator
- Responsibilities: IT infrastructure management, server administration, network operations, virtualization
- Technologies: Linux, Windows Server, Networking, Virtualization (VMware, Proxmox), Monitoring (Zabbix, Grafana)
- Context: One of Germany's most prestigious universities

### 2. Selinger Consulting - IT Consulting
- Role: Owner / IT Consultant
- Focus: Strategic IT consulting for businesses
- Services: Infrastructure analysis, technology advisory, security audits, process optimization
- Technologies: Cloud solutions (AWS, Azure), Docker, CI/CD, Ansible, Terraform

### 3. QA & Gaming - Quality Assurance Expert
- Role: QA Expert specializing in gaming and AR/VR
- Specializations: AAA game testing, AR/VR quality assurance (HoloLens 2, Oculus, Vive, Index), security research, test automation
- Technologies: Selenium, Cypress, manual testing methodologies

## Work Experience

### XboxDev - Founder & Editor (2016 - present)
Founded and manages the XboxDev news portal covering gaming industry and Xbox developer news.

### Keywords Studios - QA Tester (2017 - present)
Project-based testing of multiplayer AAA games as part of the Global Beta Test Network.

### Realworld One - QA Tester AR/VR (01/2022 - 12/2022)
Quality assurance for e-learning software in augmented and virtual reality. Focus on HoloLens 2 AR applications, VR platforms (Oculus, Vive, Index).

### Ubisoft - QA Tester (10/2020 - 10/2022)
Ad-hoc and regression testing of technical alphas (MVP) for AAA videogames.

### Scientific Games - QA Tester (01/2023)
Quality assurance for gaming applications.

### Freelance Development / QA (2016 - present)
Independent consulting and development work including website development and quality assurance projects.

## Notable Collaborations

- **Microsoft** - Insider Programs: Pre-testing & QA for Windows, Xbox, and HoloLens platforms
- **Ubisoft** - AAA Game Testing: Technical alpha and MVP testing
- **Netflix** - Security Research: HDCP vulnerability analysis for 4K content
- **Amazon Prime Video** - Security Research: HDCP implementation vulnerability analysis
- **Keywords Studios** - Global Beta Testing: AAA multiplayer game testing
- **Blue Byte (Ubisoft)** - Studio Testing: QA for strategy and simulation games
- **HashiCorp** - Technical Translation: Translation of technical documentation
- **Realworld One** - AR/VR Testing: QA for e-learning AR/VR applications
- **Adition Technologies AG** - AdTech: Programming, testing, and documentation
- **Virtual Minds AG** - Digital Marketing: QA for marketing technology platforms
- **Viadux** - Software Testing: QA for operations control system software
- **DAQA** - Game Testing: QA for AAA gaming titles

## Technical Skills

### System Administration
- Linux / Unix: Expert level
- Windows Server: Advanced
- Networking & Security: Advanced
- Virtualization (VMware, Proxmox): Advanced
- Monitoring (Zabbix, Grafana): Advanced

### Development
- Python: Advanced
- JavaScript / Node.js: Advanced
- Bash / Shell Scripting: Expert level
- HTML / CSS: Advanced
- React: Intermediate

### QA & Testing
- Manual Testing: Expert level
- Selenium / Cypress: Advanced
- AR/VR Testing (HoloLens, Oculus): Advanced
- Security Testing: Advanced

### Tools & DevOps
- Docker / Containerization: Advanced
- CI/CD (Jenkins, GitHub Actions): Advanced
- Git / Version Control: Expert level
- Ansible, Terraform: Intermediate
- AWS, Azure: Intermediate
- Nginx, Apache: Advanced
- PostgreSQL, MySQL, Redis: Intermediate

## Services Offered

### IT Consulting & Advisory
Strategic consulting for IT decisions including infrastructure analysis, technology advisory, security audits, and process optimization.

### System Administration & Infrastructure
Professional management and optimization of IT systems and network infrastructure including server management, networking, cloud solutions, and monitoring.

### QA & Testing
Comprehensive quality assurance specialized in gaming and AR/VR: AAA game testing, AR/VR QA, test automation, and security research.

## Selected Projects

- **XboxDev** (2018): Xbox developer platform for gaming industry news and tutorials
- **Huskynarr.de** (2008): Personal gaming identity project
- **RBTV.info** (2016-2022): Community project creation and management
- **Cologna** (2014-2024): Acquisition and development of one of the oldest browser games
- **Gamescom Countdown** (2018-2023): Countdown website with Discord and Twitter bot integration
- **HDCP PoC**: Security research on faulty Netflix/Amazon HDCP implementation on Xbox
- **Gamescom Survival Guide** (2020): Published guide for parents on Amazon
